channel.title: Posts on Andrew Krug | Security Professional
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Andrew Krug | Security Professional

item.title: New Site
item.description: This site was rebooted on the 24th June 2020. The content that was here before lives in github. The purpose of a personal portfolio has changed for me and the rest of the world since I launched andrewkrug.com back in the 1990s. Now I seek to use this blog space for personal experiments and security evangelism. Give Feedback or Contact Me Did you love this content? Room for improvement? Send a message.
